value:
This castle welcomes Heroes, but
does that include me? I'm only
a knight in training!

The leader we had in our platoon
back home is someone I
deeply respected.$k$pI have to admit that you remind
me somewhat of that person!

I want to become a true knight of
Altea, and thus a man of any
importance.$k$pBut to do that, I must complete my
time as a knight in training.

I have known my friend Luke for a
long time. He may act rashly,
but I know he has a good heart.

I would like to join you to scout the
area outside of the castle. It's always
best to be prepared for anything.

I beg your pardon. I'm Roderick, a
knight in training. I bring greetings
from $Nf.

I'll savor this only for a
moment. There's work to do.

How encouraging. Slow and
steady wins the race.

I may falter at this rate. I must
work harder.

I owe you thanks plus a vow to
give you my all.

My name is Roderick, a knight in
training for Altea. I will do my best to
prove my use.

Have I yet proven my use? I hope
I have grown strong enough to
be of great help to you.$k$pI find it hard to know whether I
measure up, but I sense that
I haven't disappointed you.$k$pI promise that I'll keep doing my
best not to be a burden.$k$pI hope to even lighten your load.
This order relies so much on
your strength.$k$pI can't imagine what it must be
like to bear that load. But if
you'll allow me to remain...?$k$pI will help you carry it.
はっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
…I left myself open…
I'll give it my all!
I won't go easy on you!
Brace yourself!
Duty, above all!
Sorry...
Haha
May I be of service to you?
Oh! You seem to do that a lot.
What is our plan for the next battle?
I try to remember to battle as a team—never in isolation.
If ever you need me, I am delighted to serve.
I wonder how everyone in my platoon is doing.
I am deeply honored to fight alongside you.
Understood.
Of course.
Ready.
